c74object.name: zsa.mel~
c74object.digest: Calculates and outputs Mel Coefficients as a list.
c74object.description:
zsa.mel~ Outputs Mel Coefficients according using the following formula:
for frequency values <= 1000 Hz, Mel values = frequency
for frequency values > 1000 hZ, Mel values = 1000*(1 + log10 (frequency/1000))
[see Rabiner, L. and B. Juang (1993). Fundamentals of speech recognition. New York, Prentice-Hall]

method.name: signal
method.description: If both signal inlets are connected, left signal inlet expects real values and right inlet expects imaginary values. If the left inlet is the only signal connected input, the signal is interpreted as the energy (you need to calculate it using cartopol~ or better zsa.energy~).

attribute.name: automatic
attribute.description: Turns the automatic output of the coefficients on and off.

attribute.name: bands
attribute.description: bands sets the number of Mel Bands wanted. The default value is 24 bands.
